name: Eat the Gem
description:
Solve all the puzzles and eat the gem on the top!!

Try to beat the game as fast as possible, my personal record is 45 sec. Highly recommand spawning all the four pinballs at once so there is a bigger chance to solve the first two puzzles quickly.

Control:

Z: spawn new ball

Space: launcher

<,>: flippers

Backspace: restart

Puzzles instructions: There are three puzzles. First one: hit all the three yellow buttons to open the three gates. Second one: light up the two bottons with the primiary colors that can combine the composite color shown by the rectangle light. Third one: spin the red wheel with pinball to lift up the floor.

This is my class project for CTIN 484/489, the pinball assignment
